summary: Pre-Sale Import system tested successfully. Backend: All 3 API endpoints working correctly (preview returns {count:0, items:[]}, orders returns {orders:[], count:0}, execute returns {imported:0, skipped:0, errors:0}) - expected since no Monday.com items have trigger column set. Frontend: Pre-Sale Import tab renders at /admin#unatienda with correct UI (compact stats, how-to instructions, status filters, search, preview/refresh buttons). Preview button triggers preview API and shows dialog with '0 items ready to import'. TextbookOrdersAdminTab includes 'Awaiting Link' status in ORDER_STATUSES dropdown (verified visually). Other Unatienda tabs (Inventory, Students, Stock Mov.) continue working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/store/presale-import/preview returns {count, items} - 200 OK
GET /api/store/presale-import/orders returns {orders, count} - 200 OK
GET /api/store/presale-import/orders?status=unlinked returns filtered results - 200 OK
POST /api/store/presale-import/execute returns {imported, skipped, errors} - 200 OK
All presale-import endpoints require admin Bearer token (401 without auth)
GET /api/store/textbook-orders/admin/all?status=awaiting_link accepts filter - 200 OK
Pre-Sale Import tab trigger visible with data-testid='presale-import-tab-trigger'
Pre-Sale Import tab renders content with data-testid='presale-import-tab'
Pre-Sale stats bar shows 0 total, 0 unlinked, 0 linked with data-testid='presale-stats'
How-to instructions displayed when no orders present
Status filter (All/Unlinked/Linked) visible with data-testid='presale-status-filter'
Search input visible with data-testid='presale-search'
Preview Import button visible with data-testid='preview-import-btn'
Preview Import button triggers preview API and shows dialog
Preview dialog shows '0 items ready to import from Monday.com'
Toast notification shows 'No items ready for import. Set the sync trigger column...'
TextbookOrdersAdminTab ORDER_STATUSES dropdown includes 'Awaiting Link' option
Inventory tab loads correctly
Students tab loads correctly
Stock Mov. tab loads correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-Sale Import feature is complete. Backend endpoints at /api/store/presale-import/ (preview, orders, execute, link). Frontend tab in Unatienda under ORDERS group. Currently returns 0 items since no Monday.com Textbook Orders board items have the sync trigger column (color_mm0mnmrs) set to 'Ready' or 'Listo'. Auto-link feature is hooked into student creation flow at textbook_access.py. The 'awaiting_link' status is now available in TextbookOrdersAdminTab dropdown for filtering/updating orders.
